attributes.action: invite police and Inland Revenue to look again at MPs expences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government rightly commissioned an advertising campaign targeting benefit cheats with the tag line "No ifs or buts".Recent revelations regarding MPs expenses should be investigated by the police and inland revenue to establish if there is evidence of tax evasion fraud and or general misuse of public money.If the evidence is there court action should follow. The defensive position of Parliament has been that it was "within the rules" Parliament needs to be reminded they work for the public and the public set the rules

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way. Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
